item.title: ‘The house has quadrupled in value’: I bought a house with my brother. He never contributed. How do I remove him?
item.description: “My brother lived with me for eight years, then left to live abroad, married and followed his dreams.”

item.title: TSMC breaks big revenue milestone in thumping fourth quarter, raises guidance on revenue and AI capex for 2026
item.description: TSMC’s stock jumps 5% after announcing a stonking set of 4Q numbers that have positive implications the companies it supplies and those who supply it.

item.title: ‘I will soon turn 65’: My son wants to live in my investment property for less than market rent. Do I say yes?
‘I’m considering driving Lyft part time’: I’m 58 with a $1 million home. Do I finally give up work and enjoy life?
item.description: “One thought is for me to stop working at age 60, while my wife continues for two more years at her teaching job.”

item.title: ‘It all feels impossible’: I’m 57 and on disability. My boyfriend died of a heart attack. Do I buy a townhouse or a condo?
